<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/clients/{clientId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves detailed information about a specific OAuth2 client including its name, description, redirect URIs, and scopes.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
